node.title: .gitattributes Best Practices
node.description: Best practices for configuring Git in the .gitattributes file. Configuring CRLF and LF line endings. Configuring Git Large File System (LFS) for binary files.

node.title: Writing Code while Asleep
node.description: How to write code while you sleep using tools like Stack Overflow, GitHub and forums effectively.

node.title: Social TagHelpers for ASP.NET Core
node.description: Enhance the experience of sharing a page from your site through the use of social media meta tags implemented with ASP.NET Core TagHelpers.

node.title: Colorful.Console
node.description: Colorful.Console is a C# library that wraps around the System.Console class, making your console apps more colourful. Write ASCII art using Figlet fonts.

node.title: Logging with Serilog.Exceptions
node.description: Log exception details and custom properties that are not output in Exception.ToString() using Serilog.Exceptions for .NET.

node.title: Whats New in ASP.NET Core Boilerplate
node.description: With the release of ASP.NET Core Boilerplate, this post discusses what's new and what is currently missing due to ASP.NET Core still being in beta.

node.title: NWebSec ASP.NET MVC Security Through HTTP Headers
node.description: The NWebSec NuGet packages help secure your ASP.NET MVC site using HTTP headers. The ASP.NET Core Boilerplate project template configures them our of the box.

node.title: Securing the ASP.NET MVC Web.config
node.description: The web.config file is insecure in the default ASP.NET MVC project template. This post talks you through securing the ASP.NET MVC Web.config file.

node.title: ASP.NET Core Boilerplate
node.description: ASP.NET Core Boilerplate is a professional ASP.NET MVC template for building secure, fast, robust and adaptable web applications or sites.
